titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Knowledge, Creativity and Freedom
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Knowledge, Creativity and Freedom FA1694

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-22 05:56:07 -0400.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Knowledge, Creativity and Freedom

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by originating office or officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of program files and office files.
